title: Nuclear power - no carbon dioxide emitted

content.prompt: Which of the following is considered an advantage of using nuclear power to generate electricity?

choices.label: There is a limitless supply of the raw material needed for the process of generating energy.
Nuclear power plants are inexpensive to build and maintain.
There is no potential for thermal pollution.
There is no CO2 emitted from the nuclear reaction.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
